mapper.select: select bo.id AS id, bo.name , bo.code , bo.infoDesc, bo.stage, ap.name, bo.customerId, cc.name as customerName, bo.userId, bp.userName, bs.id AS supportId, bs.supportType, bo.productName , bo.reportStatus, bo.currentState, bs.vdef2, bs.vdef3, bo.createUser AS createBy, bo.createTime , bo.updateUser AS updateBy, bo.updateTime, bs.createUser AS supportCreateBy, bs.createTime AS supportCreateTime, bs.updateUser AS supportUpdateBy, bs.updateTime AS supportUpdateTime FROM bu_opportunity bo LEFT JOIN ab_processs ap ON ap.id = bo.stage LEFT JOIN cs_customer cc ON cc.id = bo.customerId LEFT JOIN bs_person bp ON bo.userId = bp.userId LEFT JOIN bu_salessupport bs ON bs.opportunityId = bo.id where bo.reportStatus = '00000402' and bs.supportType = '0006' and bo.currentState not in('00001304','00001305','00001303','00001302')

select bo.id AS id, bo.name , bo.code , bo.infoDesc, bo.stage, bo.customerId, bo.userId, bo.productName , bo.reportStatus, bo.currentState, bo.createUser AS createBy, bo.createTime , bo.updateUser AS updateBy, bo.updateTime FROM bu_opportunity bo where bo.currentState in ('00001304','00001305','00001303','00001302')

SELECT su.id AS crmUserId, su.USER_NAME AS nickName, su.LOGIN_NAME AS userName, su.EMAIL AS email, sd.ID AS crmDeptId, su.TELEPHONE AS phonenumber, su.SEX AS sex, ~su.YN_ENABLE & 1 AS status, su.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_department sd ON su.DEPT_LONG_CODE = sd.LONG_CODE WHERE USER_NAME != 'admin'

SELECT sd.ID as crmDeptId, sd.DEPT_NAME as deptName, '1' as parentId, sd.CORP_ID as ancestors, ~sd.YN_ENABLE & 1 AS status, sd.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime FROM sys_department sd WHERE sd.YN_ENABLE = 1 UNION SELECT sc.id, sc.CORP_NAME , '0' as parentId, '' as ancestors, sc.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime FROM sys_corporation sc WHERE sc.YN_ENABLE = 1 ORDER BY parentId

select vmc.id AS crmPaymentPlanId, vmc.contractName , vmc.contractCode AS contractNumber, vmc.contractType , vmc.contractMoney AS contractAmount, vmc.signDate , vmc.customerId, cc.name AS customerName, (SELECT cc2.name FROM cs_customer cc2 WHERE id = vmc.belongPerson) AS salesperson, vmc.times AS paymentInstallment, vmc.moneybackTime AS paymentDate, vmc.conditions AS paymentTerms, vmc.money AS patmentAmount, vmc.receivedMoney , vmc.leftMoney AS accountsReceivable from view_money_condition vmc LEFT JOIN cs_customer cc ON vmc.customerId = cc.id

SELECT bsc.id AS crmContractId, bsc.contractName , bsc.contractCode AS contractNumber, bsc.contractType , bsc.contractMoney contractAmount , bsc.signDate as signingDate, cc.name AS customerName , bsc.assetsMoney AS standardAmount, bsc.discount AS contractDiscount, bsc.receivedMoney AS receivedAmount, bsc.leftMoney AS accountsReceivable, bsc.updateTime FROM bu_sale_contract bsc LEFT JOIN cs_customer cc ON bsc.customerId = cc.id

SELECT bg.id as crmId, bg.targetYear, sdc_type.DIC_ID_NAME AS type, sdc_achievement.DIC_ID_NAME AS achievementType, sdc_indicator.DIC_ID_NAME AS indicatorTypes, bg.corpId, sdc_examine.DIC_ID_NAME AS examineType, su.USER_NAME AS responsePerson, bg.goalValue, bg.sportGoal, bg.beginDate, bg.endDate, bg.updateTime FROM bu_goal bg LEFT JOIN cfbase_dms.sys_dic_cfg sdc_type ON sdc_type.DIC_ID = bg.`type` AND sdc_type.DIC_NO = 0204 LEFT JOIN cfbase_dms.sys_dic_cfg sdc_achievement ON sdc_achievement.DIC_ID = bg.achievementType AND sdc_achievement.DIC_NO = 0305 LEFT JOIN cfbase_dms.sys_dic_cfg sdc_indicator ON sdc_indicator.DIC_ID = bg.indicatorTypes LEFT JOIN cfbase_dms.sys_dic_cfg sdc_examine ON sdc_examine.DIC_ID = bg.examineType AND sdc_examine.DIC_NO = 0259 LEFT JOIN cfbase_dms.sys_user su ON su.ID = bg.responsePerson;
SELECT bg.id as crmId, bg.fid as crmParentId, bg.assessment , bg.beginDate , bg.endDate , bg.proportion , bg.baseValue , bg.sprintFproportion , bg.sprintValue , bg.updateTime FROM bu_goals bg
mapper.update: UPDATE bu_opportunity bo SET bo.currentState = #{param.currentState} WHERE bo.id = #{param.id}
UPDATE bu_opportunity bo SET bo.stage = #{param.stage} WHERE bo.id = #{param.id}
